Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that lead to Request Payment within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in variants that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in a prior loop
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that occur after exactly one prior rejection by PRE_APPROVER in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that eventually reach Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of all pre-approver-related activities (Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER) that result in approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER appears as the first approval step after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER performed by SYSTEM vs. human resources (if applicable based on org:resource)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that directly precede Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that do not contain any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in 2018 compared to 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are part of the shortest successful variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are not followed by any rejection activity later in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Fraction of cases where Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurs without any prior interaction with ADMINISTRATION or BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Average number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER per month in 2018
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that contain at least one rejection by any role
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
